description: These honey rings are inspired by a traditional maltese recipe but with added sweet cranberries and smokey dark chocolate.
name: Qaghaq Tal-Ghasel with Dark Chocolate & Cranberry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a saucepan to a medium heat and add the sugar, water, syrup, anise, lemon and orange.
Bring to the boil and then allow to simmer for 15 minutes to let it reduce and thicken.
Add the semolina and stir while cooking for another 5 minutes then remove from the heat, remove the star anise and allow to cool fully.
Roll out your thawed dough fully flat and spread your chilled filling evenly over the dough.
Evenly sprinkle the chocolate and cranberries over the sauce. Now roll the pastry into a log as right as your can.
Slice the log into about 12 pieces. Then roll out each ring into a long piece of dough and then connect the ends together to make a ring shape.
Place the rings on a baking sheet and bake for 20 minutes until the dough becomes nicely browned.
